title: NEW 1 Bed 1 Bath Gym Rooftop  Elevator
posting_body: ['308 Linden Blvd', 'Call or Text Amadeo @@347-471-4472', 'The Residences Have Every Amenity Imaginable', 'And Are Surrounded By Great Cafes And Restaurants.', 'You’re A Short 2 Block Walk to the 2 & 5 Trains at church Ave .', 'Each Apartment Comes Equipped With A Full Chef’s Kitchen, Dishwasher, Modern Bathrooms With Incredible Luxury Finishes, Central A/C', 'And So Much More!', 'Building Amenities Feature:', '- Full Gym', '- Elevator', '- Full Lobby', '- Roofdec', '- Laundry In-Building', 'Apartment Amenities Feature:', '- Spacious Bedrooms With Closets Throughout', '- Modern Bathroom With Luxury Finishes', '- Central A/C And Heat', '-Endless Amounts Of Sunlight', '- Massive Open Concept Living Room', '308 Linden Blvd', '#1A - Studio Flex 1 Bedroom $3000 + Private Patio', '#2C - 1 Bedroom $2900 + 1.5 Months Free', '#3C - 1 Bedroom $2900 + 1.5 Months Free', '#4A - 2 Bedroom $3200 +', 'W/D in unit', '#4C - 1 Bedroom $2900 + 1.5 Months Free', '#5A - 2 Bedroom $3200 + W/D in unit', '#5C - 1 Bedroom $2900 + 1 Month Free', '#6A - 2 Bedroom $3400 + W/D in unit', '#6B - 1 Bedroom $2900 + 1 Month Free', '#6C - 1 Bedroom $2900 + 1 Month Free', 'PH #7A - 1 Bedroom $3000 + 1 Month Free', 'PH #7B - 1 Bedroom $3000 + 1 Month Free', 'Building Amenities…', 'Gym', 'Rooftop', 'Elevator', 'Dog Run in backyard']
